entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers or thunderstorms. Temperature rising to 17 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy or a few thunderstorms ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 early this evening then west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to 17 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:22 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
